00039 #include <cmath>
00040 #include <cfloat>
00041 #include "Normal.h"
00042 #include "Vector3D.h"
00043 
00044 Normal::Normal( double dx, double dy, double dz )
00045 : x(dx), y(dy), z(dz)
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 Normal::Normal( const Vector3D& vector )
00050 : x(vector.x), y(vector.y), z(vector.z)
00051 {
00052 }
00053         
00054 Normal::~Normal( )
00055 {
00056 }
00057  
00058 Normal& Normal::operator+=( const Normal& nRhs )
00059 {
00060     x += nRhs.x;
00061     y += nRhs.y;
00062     z += nRhs.z;
00063     return *this;
00064 }
00065 
00066 Normal& Normal::operator-=( const Normal& nRhs )
00067 {
00068     x -= nRhs.x;
00069     y -= nRhs.y;
00070     z -= nRhs.z;
00071     return *this;    
00072 }
00073 
00074 Normal& Normal::operator*=( double a )
00075 {
00076     x *= a;
00077     y *= a;
00078     z *= a;
00079     return *this;
00080 }
00081 
00082 Normal& Normal::operator/=( double a )
00083 {
00084     double inv = 1.0/a;
00085     x *= inv;
00086     y *= inv;
00087     z *= inv;
00088     return *this;
00089 }
00090 
00091 bool Normal::operator==( const Normal& norm ) const
00092 {
00093     if( this == &norm ) 
00094         return true;
00095     else 
00096     return( 
00097         ( fabs(x - norm.x) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00098         ( fabs(y - norm.y) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00099         ( fabs(z - norm.z) < DBL_EPSILON ) );
00100 }
00101 
00102 double Normal::operator[]( int i ) const
00103 {
00104     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00105     else if( i == 1 ) return y;
00106     return z;
00107 }
00108 
00109 double& Normal::operator[]( int i )
00110 {
00111     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00112     else if( i == 1 ) return y;
00113     return z;
00114 }
00115    
00116 double Normal::LengthSquared( ) const
00117 {
00118     return( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00119 }
00120 
00121 double Normal::Length( ) const
00122 {
00123     return sqrt( LengthSquared( ) );
00124 }
00125 
00126 Normal operator-( const Normal& normal )
00127 {
00128     return Normal( -normal.x, -normal.y, -normal.z );
00129 }
00130 
00131 Normal operator+( const Normal& lhs, const Normal& rhs )
00132 {
00133     return Normal( lhs.x + rhs.x, lhs.y + rhs.y, lhs.z + rhs.z );
00134 }
00135 
00136 Normal operator-( const Normal& lhs, const Normal& rhs )
00137 {
00138     return Normal( lhs.x - rhs.x, lhs.y - rhs.y, lhs.z - rhs.z );
00139 }
00140 
00141 Normal operator*( const Normal& normal, double scalar )
00142 {
00143     return Normal( normal.x*scalar, normal.y*scalar, normal.z*scalar );
00144 }
00145 
00146 Normal operator*( double scalar, const Normal& normal )
00147 {
00148     return Normal( normal.x*scalar, normal.y*scalar, normal.z*scalar );
00149 }
00150 
00151 Normal operator/( const Normal& normal, double scalar )
00152 {
00153     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00154     return Normal( normal.x*inv, normal.y*inv, normal.z*inv );
00155 }
00156 
00157 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Normal& normal )
00158 {
00159     os << normal.x << ", " << normal.y << ", " << normal.z;
00160     return os;
00161 }
00162 
00163 double DotProduct( const Normal& nA, const Normal& nB )
00164 {
00165     return nA.x*nB.x + nA.y*nB.y + nA.z*nB.z;
00166 }
00167 
00168 double AbsDotProduct( const Normal& nA, const Normal& nB )
00169 {
00170     return fabs( DotProduct( nA, nB ) );
00171 }
00172 
00173 Normal Normalize(const Normal& n)
00174 {
00175     return n / n.Length();
00176 }
